Application Gateway

Use HTTP load balancing and delivery control to build highly scalable websites.

Apply for trial Purchase now

Azure Application Gateway enables you to build highly scalable and available websites by providing HTTP load balancing and delivery control.

Pricing Details

Application Gateway

We charge for application gateways based on their settings and the amount of time that they are available, as well as the amount of data that they process.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly price estimation is based on a usage of 744 hours every month.

* When the created Application Gateway types support multiple instances, charging will be made by the front end instance quantity/hours of the gateway, rather than by the instance quantity actually used in the back end.
Application Gateway Types Basic Application Gateway Web Application Firewall (WAF) Application Gateway
Small RMB 0.16 per gateway/hour (about RMB 119.04/month) Not available
Medium RMB 0.45 per gateway/hour (about RMB 334.80/month) RMB 1.80 per gateway/hour (about RMB 1,339.20/month)
Large RMB 2.01 per gateway/hour (about RMB 1,495.44/month) RMB 6.38 per gateway/hour (about RMB 4,746.72/month)

Data processing

The charges for data processing are based on the amount of data processed by the application gateway.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly price estimates are based on 744 hours of usage per month.
Data processing Small Medium Large
First 10 TB/month RMB 0.05/GB Free Free
Next 30 TB (10-40 TB)/month RMB 0.05/GB RMB 0.04/GB Free
Over 40 TB/month RMB 0.05/GB RMB 0.04/GB RMB 0.02/GB

Inbound data transfers

(i.e., data going into Azure data centers): data going into Azure data centers through the application gateways will be charged at standard data transfer rates.

Outbound data transfers

(i.e., data going out of Azure data centers through application gateways): data transferred out of Azure data centers through application gateways will be charged at standard data transfer rates.

FAQs

Expand all
  • Will usage of less than one hour be billed as one hour?

    Yes, usage of less than one hour will be billed as one hour.

  • Is an SLA offered for an application cloud service with only one instance? What about small application gateways?

    No. The small application gateway size is mainly used for development/testing purposes. Running production workloads on a small application gateway may exceed the processing capacity of small instances. Application Gateway supports the deployment of one or more instances within the same cloud service. Running an Application Gateway cloud service with only one instance is not recommended due to the lack of high availability.

Support and Service Level Agreements

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support to select self-service or any other methods to contact us for support.

We guarantee that every Application Gateway service with two or more medium or larger instances is available at least 99.9% of the time. We don’t offer SLAs for the Application Gateway services with only one instance or small instances. If you want to learn more about the details of our server level agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreement page.
